x:parameter.name: LICENSE_TEXT_000_License text 1
x:parameter.x:title: License text 1
x:parameter.x:value: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. In blandit ac nisl id imperdiet. Vivamus a cursus velit, ac vestibulum risus. Proin gravida auctor nunc sit amet euismod. Phasellus molestie massa vitae neque fermentum tincidunt. Morbi leo nunc, semper aliquet consequat vestibulum, commodo at dui. Integer ultricies egestas commodo. Pellentesque convallis est ut facilisis aliquet. Integer sagittis consectetur congue. Vivamus volutpat ex vitae pretium pulvinar. Aenean urna magna, dapibus varius est nec, imperdiet euismod erat. Vivamus fermentum nec urna eu auctor. Etiam condimentum id metus et aliquet. In tempor ut velit nec luctus.

x:parameter.name: LICENSE_TEXT_001_License text 2
x:parameter.x:title: License text 2
x:parameter.x:value: Sed vitae dignissim metus. Nam feugiat posuere quam, in auctor lacus facilisis id. Sed aliquam elementum nisi, sed fermentum metus eleifend sed. Praesent placerat quam dolor, sed lacinia nulla suscipit pharetra. Donec aliquam posuere odio, in aliquam leo tristique in. Cras diam quam, dapibus a sodales nec, volutpat vitae velit. Ut vitae venenatis leo, vel aliquet lectus. Nam sit amet commodo leo. Pellentesque commodo tortor ut tellus consequat pellentesque. Nullam vitae metus neque. Quisque hendrerit quam facilisis nulla sollicitudin, consequat sagittis urna rhoncus. Morbi est ex, ultricies nec lacus sit amet, blandit lobortis lacus. Morbi sagittis, dolor vel fermentum iaculis, orci nisl porta ex, mattis tempus urna nisl et lorem.

x:parameter.name: ALL_ROLES
x:parameter.x:title: Indicates if product is supported for all groups
x:parameter.x:abstract: Will be set to true if all groups are supported, else value will be set to false

x:parameter.name: ALLOWED_ROLES
x:parameter.x:title: Roles for this license product
x:parameter.x:abstract: The roles that are able to see this license product

x:parameter.x:title: The id of the usage product id.

x:parameter.x:title: The id of the usage product id.

x:parameter.x:title: The current license tax rate in percent

x:parameter.x:title: Base area unit for calculation.

x:parameter.name: SERVICE_URL
x:parameter.x:title: The service url

x:parameter.x:title: The technical type of the service

x:parameter.name: SERVICE_RESOURCES
x:parameter.x:title: All resources available for this service

x:parameter.name: WSS_URL
x:parameter.x:title: The security service url

x:parameter.name: LICENSE_DURATION
x:parameter.x:title: Duration of license validity, chooseable by the user

x:parameter.name: LICENSE_USER_GROUP
x:parameter.x:title: The group of the user
x:parameter.x:abstract: This must be set automatical by the license client and not to show in the GUI

x:parameter.name: LICENSE_USER_ID
x:parameter.x:title: The id of the user
x:parameter.x:abstract: This must be set automatical by the license client and not to show in the GUI

x:parameter.name: LICENSE_USER_TYPE
x:parameter.x:title: Which scope shall have the license
x:parameter.x:abstract: If only one value is present (static choice during configuration in license-editor) than the value may not be shown in the license client

x:parameter.name: LICENSE_PARAMETER_Integer type parameter
x:parameter.x:title: What is your shoe size?

x:parameter.name: LICENSE_PARAMETER_Text type parameter
x:parameter.x:title: What is your favourite color?

x:parameter.name: LICENSE_PARAMETER_Boolean type parameter
x:parameter.x:title: Do you want laces in your shoes?

x:parameter.name: LICENSE_PARAMETER_Enumeration type parameter
x:parameter.x:title: How many pair of shoes you need?

x:parameter.name: LICENSE_PARAMETER_Enumeration with multiple choice
x:parameter.x:title: For what kind of use you need shoes?

x:parameter.name: productPriceSum
x:parameter.x:title: The single product sum
